column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Delicious! Went on a Thursday night and waited about 10 minutes before being seated. It was definitely the place to be
column2: it was packed when we got there and when we left. Our waitress was very attentive and helpful. I had the chicken ramen and my friend had the vegetarian ramen. Both were delicious and very filling. Would definitely go back again!
